pkgmetadata.longdescription: NetSurf is a free, open source web browser. It is written in C, has its own layout and rendering engine entirely written from scratch. It is small and capable of handling many of the web standards in use today. Whether you want to check your webmail, read the news or post to discussion forums, NetSurf is your lightweight gateway to the world wide web. Actively developed, NetSurf is continually evolving and improving.
